policies.title: Code Status Documentation Requirements
policies.requirement: Code status must be documented and verified within 24 hours of admission and after any goals of care discussion
compliance_criteria: Code status documented in medical record
policies.escalation: Notify charge nurse and attending if code status unclear

policies.title: Medication Reconciliation Policy
policies.requirement: Complete medication reconciliation within 24 hours of admission, at every transfer, and at discharge
compliance_criteria: Home medications documented with doses and frequencies
Discharge medications reconciled with pre-admission list
policies.escalation: Pharmacy consult for complex reconciliation issues

policies.title: Critical Lab Value Notification
policies.requirement: Critical lab values must be communicated to ordering provider within 30 minutes of result
compliance_criteria: Lab calls floor/provider with critical value
Repeat labs ordered if clinically indicated
policies.escalation: If provider not reached in 30 minutes, escalate to charge nurse and supervisor

policies.title: Fall Prevention Protocol
policies.requirement: All patients must be assessed for fall risk on admission and with status change; high-risk patients require fall precautions
compliance_criteria: Fall risk assessment completed (Morse Fall Scale or equivalent)
Yellow fall risk bracelet applied if high risk
Patient and family educated on fall prevention
policies.escalation: Notify charge nurse of any near-miss or actual fall event

policies.title: Neutropenic Precautions
policies.requirement: Patients with ANC < 500 or severely immunocompromised require neutropenic precautions
compliance_criteria: Strict hand hygiene for all entering
No live plants or flowers in room
Masks for healthcare workers with respiratory symptoms
policies.escalation: Notify infection control for any suspected infection in neutropenic patient

policies.title: Patient Identification Policy
policies.requirement: Two patient identifiers must be verified before any medication, procedure, or specimen collection
compliance_criteria: Check patient armband for name and DOB/MRN
policies.escalation: Stop procedure if identifiers do not match; notify charge nurse

policies.title: Pain Assessment and Treatment
policies.requirement: Pain must be assessed on admission, with vital signs, and within 1 hour of pain intervention
compliance_criteria: Pain assessed using appropriate validated scale
Patient satisfaction with pain management evaluated
policies.escalation: Pain team or palliative consult for refractory pain >48 hours

policies.title: Discharge Planning Policy
policies.requirement: Discharge planning begins on admission; patient must receive written discharge instructions
compliance_criteria: Discharge needs assessment within 24 hours of admission
Case manager notified for complex discharges
Written instructions provided and reviewed with patient
policies.escalation: Notify supervisor if barriers to safe discharge identified

policies.title: Isolation Precautions
policies.requirement: Appropriate isolation precautions must be implemented based on suspected/confirmed infection
compliance_criteria: Sign posted on door with required PPE
policies.escalation: Contact infection control for isolation guidance

policies.title: Rapid Response Team Activation
policies.requirement: Rapid Response Team must be activated for acute clinical deterioration or staff concern for patient safety
compliance_criteria: Vital signs documented at time of call
policies.escalation: Call Code Blue if patient arrests or airway compromise
